phrs.translation: 教具, 实物, 教具用品, 教学用品

sentences.sentence: This article introduces the teaching experience of using common realia and learning tools to do physics demonstration experiment.
sentences.translation: 介绍了运用常规教具、学具做物理演示实验的教学经验，可供参考。

sentences.sentence: This article introduces the exploitation design thoughts and the structure functions of the realia of the new mathematics system.
sentences.translation: 介绍了新数学教具的开发设计理念和结构功能。

sentences.sentence: This article researches the meanings, functions and methods of developing self-made realia action and introduces successful experience.
sentences.translation: 对农村中小学开展自制教具活动的意义，作用和方式方法进行较全面的研究和探索，介绍了成功的经验。
